Package org.neo4j.storageengine.api

Interface IndexUpdateListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndexingService, IndexUpdateListener.Adapter
    public interface IndexUpdateListener

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  IndexUpdateListener.Adapter  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void activateIndex​(IndexDescriptor index)
      Used when activating an index after it has been created and populated.
      void applyUpdates​(Iterable<IndexEntryUpdate<IndexDescriptor>> updates, PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
      Applies indexing updates from changes in underlying storage.

      One or more indexes were created.

    • Method Detail

      • createIndexes

        void createIndexes​(Subject subject,
                   IndexDescriptor... indexes)
        One or more indexes were created. This listener should take care of managing initial population of it.
        Parameters:
        subject - subject that triggered the index creation. This is used for monitoring purposes, so work related to index creation and population can be linked to its originator.
        indexes - indexes that were created.

      • activateIndex

        void activateIndex​(IndexDescriptor index)
            throws KernelException
        Used when activating an index after it has been created and populated. Effectively this is used when activating a constraint index, where the constraint after population goes though some validation and finally gets activated.
        Parameters:
        index - index to activate.
        Throws:
        KernelException - if index failed to be activated.

      • dropIndex

        void dropIndex​(IndexDescriptor index)
        Drops an index.
        Parameters:
        index - index to be dropped.

      • applyUpdates

        void applyUpdates​(Iterable<IndexEntryUpdate<IndexDescriptor>> updates,
                  PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
           throws IOException,
                  KernelException
        Applies indexing updates from changes in underlying storage.
        Parameters:
        updates - stream of updates to apply.
        cursorTracer - underlying page cursor tracer
        Throws:
        IOException
        KernelException

      • validateIndex

        void validateIndex​(long indexReference)
            throws KernelException
        Called before commit to ask whether or not the particular indexReference is valid.
        Parameters:
        indexReference - reference to the index being validated.
        Throws:
        KernelException - if index isn't valid.
